title: We’re All Especially Sympathizing With That Man - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Tragedy
tags: Arranged Marriage   Divorce   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Multiple Transported Individuals   Reincarnation   Transmigration   Unrequited Love
author: 廿乱
description:
Yuan Zhan, a video game streamer who claims to be 100% straight, can always play danmei games in many romance-based games. Suddenly, he transmigrated into a modern danmei novel, which is the original work of the game adaption he was playing “My Ten Ex-Fiancés and Me”. 

In the novel, Yuan Zhanqi had a slag for a father and similarly, a mother with no integrity, participating in debauchery, who even wanted to hook up with her son’s husband. Yuan Zhanqi, with his peach blossom eyes, fine eyebrows, slender waist, and perky butt, was labeled as “someone who will definitely cheat on his husband” after he got married. His husband didn’t love him, his family was unreliable, and Yuan Zhanqi kept having to face various kinds of people trying to seduce his husband. Yuan Zhanqi was constantly labeled as a cheater. In the end, he was framed by others, misunderstood by his husband, and finally died from depression. The ending had “tragedy” written all over. 

In order to fulfill the original owner’s wish, Yuan Zhan must make the husband, Yan Jingxi, who has been entangled with the protagonist, Bai Yueguang, fall in love with himself.
